item.title: GitLab Productivity Tracking: Know How Your Team Breathing
item.description: How do I know if my team performs well? How to tell that with data? If we’re underperformed or didn’t meet the deadline, how to find the causes and tackle them? I was thinking about analyzing the entire activities in my team to get some insights, starting from GitLab issues. I put some filters to the issues: Has been assigned to someone Has mentioned in (at least one) a merge request Has been closed The entire time spent (from open to closed) is less than two weeks (some issues were created as reference or documentation which sometimes took a bit long to be resolved) For each, I fetch the:
